quote.text: Everyone is necessarily the hero of his own life story.
quote.author: John Barth (1930 - )

quote.text: Everything is connected... no one thing can change by itself.
quote.author: Paul Hawken

quote.text: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
quote.author: Princess Diana

quote.text: The production of too many useful things results in too many useless people.
quote.author: Karl Marx

quote.text: If two men on a job agree all the time, then one is useless. If they disagree all the time, then both are useless.
quote.author: Darryl F. Zanuck

quote.text: I'm not dumb. I just have a command of thoroughly useless information.
quote.author: Bill Watterson
